Class MedicalRecord

java.lang.Object
MedicalRecord
public class MedicalRecord
extends java.lang.Object
MedicalRecord class holds Patient's medical record and acts on them.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Asma

    • addToDoctorVisits

      public void addToDoctorVisits​(DoctorVisit doctorVisit)
      When Patient visits a doctor, it's details should be considered and stores here. Also add the prescription of the DoctorVisit to prescriptions list.
      Parameters:
      doctorVisit - DoctorVisit to be added to the list

    • addToDisease

      public void addToDisease()
      Add a new disease to patient's diseases list.

    • searchPrescriptionsList

      public Prescription searchPrescriptionsList​(ir.huri.jcal.JalaliCalendar date, Doctor doctor)
      Search prescriptions list based on date and doctor then return the matched prescription.
      Parameters:
      date - prescription's date
      doctor - doctor who has written the prescription
      Returns:
      matched prescription
